title: Delete a data policy
description: Deletes a data policy by its resource name using the BigQuery Data Policy API.

objective.narrative: This sample addresses the lifecycle management of data policies. When a governance rule is no longer needed, or a test policy needs to be cleaned up, the corresponding data policy must be removed to avoid unintended data masking.

regionTags.name: bigquerydatapolicy_v2beta1_datapolicyservice_datapolicy_delete
regionTags.title: Delete a data policy
regionTags.description: Deletes a data policy by its resource name using the BigQuery Data Policy API.
